Characteristic.name: Five Zone Heart Rate Limits

InformativeText.Abstract: Data structure containing the limits between the heart rate zones for the 5-zone heart rate definition (Maximum, Hard, Moderate, Light and Very Light).

Field.name: Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Very light / Light Limit
Field.InformativeText: Unit is in beats per minute with a resolution of 1

Field.name: Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Light / Moderate Limit
Field.InformativeText: Unit is in beats per minute with a resolution of 1

Field.name: Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Moderate / Hard Limit
Field.InformativeText: Unit is in beats per minute with a resolution of 1

Field.name: Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Hard / Maximum Limit
Field.InformativeText: Unit is in beats per minute with a resolution of 1

Characteristic.Note: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
